bug.author: vapaunic
bug.summary: [BUG] Prediction HORIZON specified in forecast settings, but not used
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
We specify a value PRED_HORIZON in forecast_setttings,py to be used as a forecasting horizon. However, we don't use this value when forecasting, or creating the train/test data splits. Rather, variables TRAIN(TEST)_START(END)_WEEK are used as a proxy for the prediction horizon. <denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the bug?</denchmark-h>
